content: AMA SG Budget Babe Career General Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Aug 2018Dear SG Budget Babe, what's one biggest advice for us 20s to be a millionaire by 30 and what would you have done differently if you were in your 20s again?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 14 Aug 2018Cut your expenses, boost your income, grow your savings and investments. And be realistic. If you don't earn enough, a millionaire dream may not be feasible unless you're lucky to strike Toto.http://www.sgbudgetbabe.com/2016/03/the-easiest-way-to-build-wealth-in-your.html?m=1I would have started investing earlier in my 20s and gone for courses by The Fifth Person and Dr Wealth earlier, which could have saved me from some mistakes I made in my investing journey. 0 comments1
